sub_title: Medical Coordinator of the ECG department at Leiden University Medical Center
summary: Experienced Medical Coordinator with a demonstrated history of working in the hospital & health care industry. Skilled in Epidemiology, Dutch, English, Cantonese, and Scientific Writing. Strong healthcare services professional with a great affinity for ECG signal processing and Electrocardiographic/ vectorcardiographic-related research .
